product_name: The North Face Super Diez Down Jacket - Men's
long_description: Filled with premium 900-fill-power goose down, The North Face Super Diez jacket offers toasty insulation with minimal weight. It skimps on bulkiness, but not on durability or warmth. Constructed with highly durable 10-denier nylon Pertex(R) fabric; material is svelte and stands up to rugged surfaces. Premium 900-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Slim baffles enhance warmth, keeping down from shifting to eliminate cold spots throughout the jacket. Elastic-bound cuffs and hideaway hem drawcord. The North Face Super Diez jacket has zippered handwarmer pockets; jacket stows in hand pocket.
short_description: Filled with premium 900-fill-power goose down, The North Face Super Diez jacket offers toasty insulation with minimal weight. It skimps on bulkiness, but not on durability or warmth.
